column1: NO2, European air quality data for 2014
column2: The data set provides concentrations for the air pollutants NO2 at 1 km grid combining monitoring air quality data in a ‘regression-interpolation-merging mapping’ methodology and the observational values of the air quality monitoring stations used in the interpolation. It covers Europe for the year 2014. It provides estimates for human health related indicators of pollutants NO2 (annual average) for the year 2014.
